title: This might be the dessert-themed codename for Android 14 “U”
content:
Android 13 is due its first beta release any day now, but that doesn’t mean all of Google’s engineers are focused purely on it. Work is still ongoing for other platform versions too, and some of the first commits relating to Android 14 have popped up on the Android Gerrit. Those commits reference the next

The post This might be the dessert-themed codename for Android 14 “U” appeared first on xda-developers.
